Clara Kwentoh has just published her first book!
Brilliant, so are you going over to watch it?
Yes, it requires that I get to the city center by 10 a.m. Or thereabouts.
Why so early in the morning?
A revelation has been annoying me for two nights now.
I trust you'll have a safe journey.
But I think she -- Kwentoh -- is such a die-hard!
